Collect unpaid taxes of POGOs first before taxing online sellers --Hontiveros tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-742140 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/742140/collect-unpaid-taxes-of-pogos-first-before-taxing-online-sellers-hontiveros/story/ "Imbes na online sellers, baka pwedeng singilin muna ang mga POGO na may P50 billion in unpaid taxes?" Senator Risa Hontiveros said in a statement."Hindi 'yung dagdag-perwisyo pa sa sarili nating mga kababayan na kaunti na nga lang ang kita para pandagdag-gastos sa pamilya nila," she added. Thu, 11 Jun 2020 11:12:15 +0800

DepEd s Briones: Almost 10M students signed up on first eight days of enrollment tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-742135 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/742135/deped-s-briones-almost-10m-students-signed-up-on-first-eight-days-of-enrollment/story/ During a Senate hearing, Education Secretary Leonor Briones said the enrollment turnout rate is equivalent to 36.26% of the Department of Education's (DepEd) projected enrollment for this year. Of the total number, 577,695 enrolled in kindergarten, 4.8 million in elementary, 3.2 million in junior high school, and 1.09 million in senior high school. Thu, 11 Jun 2020 10:16:26 +0800
